competitors.name: Cooper's Hawk Winery & Restaurant- Oak Lawn

reviews.text:
I had high expectations for Palermos restaurant but sadly, it was a very unpleasant experience. I ordered
minestrone soup that was very salty, pizza bread was flavorless and the sauce was too sweet.
Grilled chicken salad was fine.
But the worst part is the cleanliness of the restaurant bathroom was dirty.
Ventilation diffusers are very dirty i would say they never been cleaned.
And the ceiling as well.

I asked to talk to the manager. He did come to me and listened to me, but when I mentioned that the restaurant wasn't clean ,he started having a bad attitude towards me. He mentioned that that wasn't the right place for me. And that He prefers other customers.

Palermo's Pizza is one of the best italian and Pizza's Restaurant of Chicago offering delicious dishes by Italian cuisine and an incredible number of fantastic Pizza's.
Rino Siconolfi
Instagram rino_siconolfi

How a business responds to issues, Speaks to the "PROFESSIONALISM" of the establishment and those operating the establishment!!!

I visited Palermo's after a highly recommendation from the front desk host of my hotel I was staying in during my visit. Upon my arrival I was excited from the look of the establishment to the aroma of the Italian meals being prepared that filled the air. I get to the host stand and instantly I get bad attitude from the young hostess that was working the host stand, the manner in which she carried herself from the initial greeting to escorting me to my table. "I had literally just got off the road from a 10hour drive and was determined not to let this young lady ruin my experience". I initially exited out of the restaurant and was about to take my business elsewhere, something told me "to go back in" I went back in and the manager and I think one of the owners (possibly) was right there talking to her trying to see what transpired. I immediately told them how she addressed me from the time I walked in to the escorting of me to my table. They responded with such professionalism and assurance that this was not how they operate or do business (without even saying it). This spoke to the integrity of this business, they didn't deflect the accountability of what took place....They were PROFESSIONAL!! The service from my waiter was impeccable, the food was Impeccable and impressive as well! I had calamari, Tried the pizza and tried the chicken Parmesan!! My total was $101 after my Tip. I am a world traveler and lots of people look at my google reviews as I am a honest Google Reviewer.

To the young lady working the host desk on 02/06/25 Be mindful of your actions and how you Treat individuals, when Great companies like this put you in a position to represent their brand....you represent them wholeheartedly because you are one of many faces that represent who they are as a company. The image you display could be detrimental to everything they've worked hard to build!!

I want to thank the managers your level of leadership was UNMATCHED!! Thank You

We ordered a large Italian beef pizza for pickup, and wow it was amazing! This was my first time trying this place (my husband suggested it), and it definitely did not disappoint. The pizza was so delicious that we finished the entire box in no time. I‚Äôm already craving more!

We a private room for about 25 people.  The service was awesome.  They allowed us to decorate and bring in our own cake. We had a special menu of five different choices.  Every dish from the place is delicious.  Would definitely go back.

editorial_summary.overview: Rustic, family-owned eatery serving pizza, antipasti & classic Italian entrees since 1961.

recentReviews.text: One of the best slices of pizza I have ever had , I will always gonhere

I came in around 9 pm and got the pasta alfredo. It was pretty good but i lost my appetite due to the behavior I saw. A burly man groped a waitresses‚Äô derri√®re. I was shocked and disgusted by this and will not be returning.

I give this Grilled Chicken Salad a üíØ on üëâ!!!!  FOR REAL. It looks like a painting!!!!! I had to remove the chicken to show you what was underneath. AWESOME!!!
Whoever is making these GRILLED CHICKEN SALADS well here's to you üëèüëèüëèüëè
I have been meaning to take a pic for months,,but I have realized that I ate it all already ‚ò∫Ô∏è

A must have!!!

Rose

Waiters were not very friendly. I will never step into this place again. Food was very bland. Needs improvement. I had reservations met with Reunion family members not impressed. We all got one bill no separate checks. That sucks.
cozy with great food and the best pizza

The tiramasu is amazing!!!!!  I would order 10 in one sitting it is so good.  My friend and I go to pizza places around the city and found this is our favorite for pizza.  The sauce has a sweetness to it without tasting like sugar.  Maybe they add a sweet red when making it.  Either way it is delicious. We come here at least twice a month and trek from Hyde Park.

I have two criticisms.  They have a martini night where drinks are $7.  They taste good but are watery in my opinion.  I mean, this hardcore Irish drinker expects to feel a buzz after 4 martinis.  I stick to the beer when I'm there which they have a decent selection of.

detailedReviews.author: Francis F.
detailedReviews.text: One of the best slices of pizza I have ever had , I will always gonhere

detailedReviews.author: Jose De Los Santos
detailedReviews.text: Waiters were not very friendly. I will never step into this place again. Food was very bland. Needs improvement. I had reservations met with Reunion family members not impressed. We all got one bill no separate checks. That sucks.

detailedReviews.author: kathleen rutherford
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful stuffed pizza

detailedReviews.author: Lawrence Ventresca
detailedReviews.text: cozy with great food and the best pizza

detailedReviews.author: Christine Stelmack
detailedReviews.text: Best Italian restaurant ever!

detailedReviews.author: Michael Scampini
detailedReviews.text:
The tiramasu is amazing!!!!!  I would order 10 in one sitting it is so good.  My friend and I go to pizza places around the city and found this is our favorite for pizza.  The sauce has a sweetness to it without tasting like sugar.  Maybe they add a sweet red when making it.  Either way it is delicious. We come here at least twice a month and trek from Hyde Park.

I have two criticisms.  They have a martini night where drinks are $7.  They taste good but are watery in my opinion.  I mean, this hardcore Irish drinker expects to feel a buzz after 4 martinis.  I stick to the beer when I'm there which they have a decent selection of.

detailedReviews.author: Tarek Cheaib
detailedReviews.text:
Classic local Italian American restaurant. Almost guaranteed to have a bowl of spaghetti served with your dish, regardless of what you ordered!

Portions are the size of little humans!!!

detailedReviews.author: Christopher J. Vezeau
detailedReviews.text: Definitely some of the best pizza in the nation (not just locally) and I mean that seriously. People from the Chicagoland area are spoiled. I don't think you realize how much so until you have pizza from outside of Chicago. Palermo's is one of the best in the nation in my opinion.

detailedReviews.author: Keisha JACKSON
detailedReviews.text: We a private room for about 25 people.  The service was awesome.  They allowed us to decorate and bring in our own cake. We had a special menu of five different choices.  Every dish from the place is delicious.  Would definitely go back.

detailedReviews.author: Michael Mccarthy
detailedReviews.text: Great food The Pizza is great

detailedReviews.author: Joey Madina
detailedReviews.text:
I have never been more utterly disgusted with an establishment I once trusted for nearly 30 years. Palermo‚Äôs has sunk to a new low, and I am appalled at how they took advantage of my grieving family. They nickel and dimed us at every turn, charging for full tables that weren‚Äôt even seated, serving us rock-hard, unsliced bread with no olive oil unless we paid extra. And guess what? Nowhere did their menu warn us about that sneaky little charge. It‚Äôs beyond greedy, it‚Äôs shameless.

We paid for what was supposed to be unlimited refreshments, only to be told soda was part of a cash bar. They shoved us into a dark, dingy corner of the room while other guests got better lighting and treatment. And let‚Äôs not forget the rude staff, including that kid with the white glasses who acted like we were inconveniencing him just by existing.

This was a disgraceful, gut-wrenching experience. Palermo‚Äôs used to be about tradition and quality, and now they‚Äôre just out to wring every dime they can out of anyone, even families in mourning. If you‚Äôre thinking of hosting an event here, be warned: they will take advantage of you too

detailedReviews.author: Kelly Kolton
detailedReviews.text: Can't go wrong with their pizza or Chicken Parmesan!

detailedReviews.author: Yas Warda
detailedReviews.text: We ordered a large Italian beef pizza for pickup, and wow it was amazing! This was my first time trying this place (my husband suggested it), and it definitely did not disappoint. The pizza was so delicious that we finished the entire box in no time. I‚Äôm already craving more!

detailedReviews.author: Kathryn Holmes
detailedReviews.text: THE BEST PIZZA! Best customer service! Best pizza! Regular crust, sausage pizza - perfection!

detailedReviews.author: Bonnie Shea
detailedReviews.text: Great food - love everything & always have - I have one issue - you need to update your website!  All of your entrees are at least $10 higher than listed on your website - not good!

detailedReviews.author: Rino Siconolfi, MBA
detailedReviews.text:
Palermo's Pizza is one of the best italian and Pizza's Restaurant of Chicago offering delicious dishes by Italian cuisine and an incredible number of fantastic Pizza's.
Rino Siconolfi
Instagram rino_siconolfi

detailedReviews.author: Francis Tham
detailedReviews.text:
I ordered take outs, one regular and one deep dish pizza which took longer to bake than predicted. It was dinner time so the restaurant was super busy even for take outs.
The pizzas were delicious.
It was my first time trying this pizzeria. I was not disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: Tom Burns
detailedReviews.text: Good traditional pizza. Nice, comfortable setting.

detailedReviews.author: Evan K Brown (Evan K. Brown)
detailedReviews.text: I had a lovely lunch at Palermo's with my wife. We had two glasses of wine each, and thought they had a solid selection for the type of establishment. Our waitress (Melissa) was super helpful and kind (letting us know that the deep dish pizzas take around 40min to cook before we ordered). Additionally, the he food was very tasty and well priced.

detailedReviews.author: Michelle Cody
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was excellent.  Drinks were super cold and strong

detailedReviews.author: Ed Bischoff
detailedReviews.text: Almost as good as 63rd St. great flavor and great portions

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Weiler
detailedReviews.text: Wonderful "mom and pop" Italian.

detailedReviews.author: Elizabeth Gonzalez
detailedReviews.text: Muy sabroso lo recomiendo

detailedReviews.author: James Malone
detailedReviews.text: I had the chicken parm. To be honest, the chicken and  sauce were not remarkable.

detailedReviews.author: L J
detailedReviews.text:
Though atmosphere is important, I didnt come for that. I was seated rather quickly and ordered right away. Classic lasagna, salad, and wings. The bread was hard as a brick. The salad came brown and wilted. Like, they HAD TO HAVE seen it before, during, and after plating! The fact the waitress placed it at the table instead of telling them to do better is beyond me. After requesting a new salad, I unravel the silverware and they are dirty! Not water mark dirty, I mean dried food no wash dirty. So, I requested clean silverware. At this point the waitress was visibly annoyed. She brought the silverware and I saw her once more to bring the lasagna, which was flavorless and cold, and again for the bill. No one asked if I wanted a water refill the entire 45 mins I was there.
I dont leave reviews often, but this visit was one to remember. And not in a pleasant way.

detailedReviews.author: Pat Kieltyka
detailedReviews.text: Go here and get the pizza! Reasonably priced, super sweet tasty sauce. The pizzas are done on time and just go in and pick em up! The pizza is amazing the day after too, I just order a large and eat the fridge pizza the next few days.  Definitely my go to for quality pizza

detailedReviews.author: Colorful Berries
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza and the pasta with shrimp and broccoli was hot, fresh and a lot to eat.

detailedReviews.author: Elia Alvarez
detailedReviews.text: Unfortunately, the food wasn't that great. My dish had a peculiar taste, I had ordered the meat ravioli, and the tiramisu needed more coffee flavor.

detailedReviews.author: Sharon Rodriguez
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza

detailedReviews.author: Ken Dech
detailedReviews.text: Old School Italian with generous portions.  I tried the Chicken Marsala but something about the mushrooms did not agree with me.  Pizza was on Point!

detailedReviews.author: Sergio Garcia
detailedReviews.text: Best pizza best crust best sauce !

detailedReviews.author: Nate D
detailedReviews.text: The lady bartender is sooo sweet! She took the time to give me personalized drink suggestions, and they were absolutely amazing. Super friendly, attentive, and made the experience even better!

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Vincent
detailedReviews.text: Great place, our Server Dinecia was fantastic. The food was excellent. Always enjoy coming here

detailedReviews.author: Large_flips_that!
detailedReviews.text: Palermo‚Äôs 95th in Oak Lawn serves a stellar sausage pizza, earning 4 stars. The thin crust is crispy yet chewy, topped with flavorful, fennel-rich sausage, tangy sauce, and gooey mozzarella. The cozy, family-friendly vibe and attentive service add to the experience. Only downside: the pizza could arrive hotter. Highly recommend for a classic Chicago pie!

detailedReviews.author: Joe Mathis Iii
detailedReviews.text: Thin and Crispy is to Die for!!! I'll add Photos next time, I was so Hungry I Forgot!!!

detailedReviews.author: Julia Sandoval
detailedReviews.text: My, first time here. Went with my best friend for her birthday. Kile the server was the best. He, will be our next server everytime we go.

detailedReviews.author: Darnell Wilson
detailedReviews.text: The food is always really good and fresh tasting ingredients. Never let's me down. I've been eating at Palermo's for 30 years and I don't think that'll ever change. The best pizza on the Southside of Chicago hands down. The food is good to go. But when you dine in to eat, the pizza seems to taste 1000x better. I don't know why.

detailedReviews.author: Andre Peeples
detailedReviews.text: Usually get it delivered but, picked it up this time! Definitely one of the most consistent pizza places I've been to. Always delicious! All toppings are proportionate to the size of the pizza & each other. Sweet sauce, crispy crust! Can't go wrong!

detailedReviews.author: John Madeja
detailedReviews.text: Food and service was great.

detailedReviews.author: Jessica Rojas
detailedReviews.text: Highly recommend their pizza. Nice thin, seasoned crust with a great tasting sauce.

detailedReviews.author: Deborah Sawyer
detailedReviews.text: My favorite restaurant for pizza & fried chicken.  Always good, and tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Robert Gurskis
detailedReviews.text: I love üíò their üçï!

detailedReviews.author: Edward Ragland
detailedReviews.text: I lived in Oaklawn in the mid 70's and enjoyed  going there then and it's just as wonderful now. I was there with a close friend recently and will go back next time I'm back.

detailedReviews.author: Ron Oglesby
detailedReviews.text: Love the pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Jackqueline Davis
detailedReviews.text: I absolutely love this place! Great food, great service! I just wish they offered pizza on the kid's menu.

detailedReviews.author: pacifist lupercio
detailedReviews.text:
I had high expectations for Palermos restaurant but sadly, it was a very unpleasant experience. I ordered
minestrone soup that was very salty, pizza bread was flavorless and the sauce was too sweet.
Grilled chicken salad was fine.
But the worst part is the cleanliness of the restaurant bathroom was dirty.
Ventilation diffusers are very dirty i would say they never been cleaned.
And the ceiling as well.

I asked to talk to the manager. He did come to me and listened to me, but when I mentioned that the restaurant wasn't clean ,he started having a bad attitude towards me. He mentioned that that wasn't the right place for me. And that He prefers other customers.

detailedReviews.author: Mike Stahulak
detailedReviews.text: Food is very good, prices are reasonable.

detailedReviews.author: James Ganta
detailedReviews.text: Pizza here is very consistent if you don't like sweet sauce you will not like the pizza if you like a thicker Crust Pizza you should try their deep dish it's really good I tried their lasagna was not a fan I also tried the fettuccine alfredo not a fan but I am also very picky when it comes to pasta and majority of restaurants I go to they just don't know how to cook pasta I think I'll stick to just making it at home or find an Italian place to hire me to make their pasta haha if you come here I highly recommend the pizza. I did go on a Saturday they were very busy the waitress did the best she could but I think they need to hire some more waitresses even the table behind me was complaining

detailedReviews.author: Aliya Rodrigues
detailedReviews.text:
Our server and busser were amazing! The food was delicious as well. I can't lie I was nosey and listened and watched a Karen complain about everything the staff did and get upset with management, but they handled it amazingly. They tried working with her to help make up for everything they (didn't) do wrong, and when she still wasn't happy and raising her voice, they helped her leave. I love the way they backed their staff while still being considerate of the customer until the extreme. Perfectly handled Ms Manager and Mr Owner ‚ò∫Ô∏è

ps Karen I hope you see this I really really do, theres a reason you kept calling that man only your boyfriend üö´üíç

detailedReviews.author: Lisa Huseman Hale
detailedReviews.text: Great pizza! Real family feel atmosphere.

detailedReviews.author: Tommy Hayes
detailedReviews.text: Great service!

detailedReviews.author: Jesus
detailedReviews.text: Love this pizza üçï The sauce and home made sausage one of the best out there

detailedReviews.author: Nino Conti
detailedReviews.text: A wonderful restaurant. The atmosphere is incredibly warm and inviting. The food is incredible and the service is spot on. The pizza is above and beyond. We drive from Park Ridge to enjoy. We also go to Coletti‚Äôs in Jefferson Park but Palermo‚Äôs is three steps above. Hope you enjoy as much as we do!!!

detailedReviews.author: Jose Islas
detailedReviews.text: As a Latino American, never felt so discriminate before, till I got to this place they made me wait for 1 hr , because I didn‚Äôt have a reservation but more people with out a reservation was taking care of‚Ä¶ I will never come back to this place ever again.!!!!

detailedReviews.author: Yvonne Delia
detailedReviews.text: Awesome food, pizza was excellent, ravioli was really tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Sue Strezo
detailedReviews.text: Pizza was delicious.  Service was great.

detailedReviews.author: joann p
detailedReviews.text: We attended a birthday party at Palermo's. EVERYTHING was delicious, appetizers, soup, salad, and veal Parmigiana. Service was  good too. The dining room was also busy with patrons having full meals or pizza. Highly recommend.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.5/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the pizza, describing it as some of the best in the nation and consistently delicious. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The Grilled Chicken Salad is highly praised for its presentation and taste, with customers eager to share their experiences. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
The restaurant offers excellent service, especially for private events, allowing customization and providing a memorable dining experience. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues, including poor customer service and cleanliness concerns - review management can address this concern
Lack of atmosphere/ambiance awareness and inconsistency in service quality - social media marketing can improve this area
Long wait times and service inefficiencies - Boostly marketing services can improve this
